Name: Stophat
About the game: Stophat is a charming arcade game about a rich man, his disobedient top hat and a falling golden lift. Originally made in under 48 hours for the 14th gm(48) competition, Stophat is an imaginative take on the theme 'top-down'. There's some groovy bossa nova beats and Atari-style sound effects, dramatic lift-plummeting actionâ„¢, and a play time of a whole 10 minutes.
